### Aircraft Maintenance Height Adjustable Work Platform RFP

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3696196120-Doc3938180169
* **Tender Closing Date**: Monday, 2023-05-15 14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3696196120
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-05-10

#### Procurement Information

* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions and Contact Information

* **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: Department of Transport (TC)
	+ Address: 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0N8
* **Contracting Authority Contact**: Lafontaine, Raphael (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Description

The Department of Transport (TC) is seeking a supplier to provide two (2) Aircraft Maintenance Height Adjustable Work Platforms to be delivered in Ottawa, in accordance with the Purchase Description dated March 28, 2023. The platforms must meet the requirements as described in Annex B – Pricing. 

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-04-24 by 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process by contacting the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of the results.

---

Note: The tendering process is now closed. The tender closing date has passed.
